lWaypoints.wv2.2.1: Action 32801 31248 7 --You can find the configurable settings in Hotkeys - Persistent - Setup! --Script made by BlakW, I hope you enjoy it. --If you have a question add to msn blakw_support@hotmail.com or send an Email or PM. --Tell the security ID to BlakW if he asked you to prove that you bought this script from him. --Security ID: ISJDAYEN832 --If you didn't got this script from BlakW please report back to him. --If someone get cought trying to resell this script will be reported and banned from NeoBot Forums. --For more scripts visit: http://forums.tibianeobot.com/showthread.php?8486-%E2%97%84-BlakW-Scripts-%E2%96%BA-Cavebot-amp-Targeting-List-%E2%80%BC
lWaypoints.wcheckPosition: Action 32802 31249 7 if $self.posz == 7 then gotolabel('onCity') end if $self.posz >= 8 then gotolabel('hunt') end
lWaypoints.w: Action 32781 31246 6 if not islocation() then gotolabel('onCity') else minimizewindows('equip') minimizewindows() end
lWaypoints.wdepositer: Action 32781 31244 6 --Advanced Depositer by BlakW init start local i = 1 local itemdrop = (itemsRares) init end setpriority(10,0,5000,300000,0) wait(2000,4000) reachgrounditem('depot') openitem('depot') wait(2000) openitem(bp1, 'Locker') wait(500,1000) local totalcount repeat openitem(bp2, bp1, true, i) wait(500,1000) for a,b in ipairs(itemdrop) do moveitems(b,bp2,nil) end closewindows(bp2) totalcount = 0 for a,b in ipairs(itemdrop) do totalcount = totalcount+itemcount(b,'0-15') end if totalcount > 0 then i = i+1 end until totalcount == 0 or i > 20 wait(2000) closewindows() wait(500, 1000) openitem(Mainbpname, 'back') wait(400, 1100) resizewindows(0, Mainbpname, 1) wait(400, 1100) openitem(LootBpId, Mainbpname, true, 1) wait(350,850) resizewindows(0, LootBpId, 2) wait(350,850)
lWaypoints.w: Action 32792 31249 7 if windowcount(MainBpId) == 0 or windowcount(LootBpId) ==0 then gotolabel('onCity') end if not islocation() then gotolabel('dpdown') end

Action 32824 31248 7 say('hi') wait(2000, 3000) npcsay('deposit all') wait(500, 1500) npcsay('yes') wait(500, 1500) npcsay('withdraw ' .. money) wait(500, 1500) npcsay('yes') wait(500, 1500) npcsay('balance') wait(500, 1500) wait(1000) openitem(GoldBpId, Mainbpname, true, 1) wait(500,900)
Action 32815 31254 7 if windowcount(GoldBpId) == 0 then gotolabel('bank') end if not islocation() then gotolabel('bank') end

lWaypoints.wshop: Action 32789 31239 5 init start counter = 0 init end setpriority(30,0,180000,180000,0) local flaskcount = itemcount(283)+itemcount(284)+itemcount(285) say('default','hi') wait(2000,3000) if flaskcount > 0 then npcsay('flask') for i=1,math.ceil(flaskcount/100) do npcsay('yes') end end npcsay('trade') wait(1000,1500) while itemcount(mananame) < maxmana do counter = counter+1 buyitemsupto(mananame, maxmana) if counter > 10 then gotolabel('crash') end end while itemcount('sudden death rune') < maxsd do counter = counter+1 buyitemsupto('sudden death rune', maxsd) if counter > 10 then gotolabel('crash') end end
lWaypoints.wreCheck: Action 32790 31235 7 if itemcount(mananame) < maxmana then gotolabel('onCity') end

ePauseHotkey.hScript: if not $targeting or not $cavebot then settargeting('on') setcavebot('on') setlooting('on') listas('Cavebot Resumed') else settargeting('off') setcavebot('off') setlooting('off') listas('Cavebot Paused.') end wait(300)

ePause.hScript: if not $cavebot or not $targeting then listas('Enabling Cavebot and Targeting') setcavebot('on') settargeting('on') wait(1000) else listas('Disabling Cavebot and Targeting') setcavebot('off') settargeting('off') stopattack() wait(1000) end

eIDCheck.hScript: function cursorinfo() -- Credits to Anonymickey, for doing the calculations. local temp = {x,y,z,id} if $cursor.x >= $worldwin.left and $cursor.x <= $worldwin.right and $cursor.y <= $worldwin.bottom and $cursor.y >= $worldwin.top then local sqmWidth = ($worldwin.bottom - $worldwin.top)/11 temp.x, temp.y, temp.z = $posx - 8 + math.ceil(($cursor.x - $worldwin.left)/sqmWidth), $posy - 6 + math.ceil(($cursor.y - $worldwin.top)/sqmWidth), $posz temp.id = topitem(temp.x, temp.y, $posz).id else temp.x, temp.y, temp.z, temp.id = 0,0,0,0 end return temp end listas('dontlist')

eAdvanced-Setup-by-BlakW.hScript: ----------------Advanced Setup by BlakW---------------- init start ----------------Script---------------------- --Script Version (Dont edit this!) scriptversion = '2.2.1' ----------------Wpt's setup----------------- --None needed for this version. ----------------BP setup-------------------- --Your main backpack name? Mainbpname = 'Backpack of Holding' --Your gold backpack name? GoldBpId = 'Heart Backpack' -- Your loot backpack name? LootBpId = 'Jewelled Backpack' ----------------Supplys setup----------------- --How many mfs bot will buy? maxmana = 500 --Name of mana that bot will use? mananame = 'strong mana potion' --How many mfs bot will go refill? minmana = 100 --How many golds bot will withdraw from bank? money = 90000 --How many sd bot will buy? maxsd = 120 ----------------DP setup----------------- --This is the backpack type that has the backpacks inside. Like a grey backpack filled with 20 fur backpacks. bp1 = 'red backpack' --This is where the items will be throwed to. bp2 = 'brocade backpack' --Item ID's to deposit in Backpacks. itemsRares = {'Small Ruby', 'Quara Tentacle', 'Small Amethyst', 'Quara Eye', 'White Pearl', 'Black Pearl', 'Small Emerald', 'Wand of Cosmic Energy', 'Knight Armor', 'Blue Robe', 'Glacier Shoes', 'Quara Pincers', 'Warrior Helmet', 'Glacier Robe', 'Crown Armor', 'Giant Shrimp', 'Quara Bone', 'Small Diamond', 'Skull Helmet', 'Relic Sword', 'Fish Fin', 'Stealth Ring'} init end

eGeneralStatusSETUP.hScript: init start generalStatus = { fontSize = 7, font = 'Tahoma', fontSpace = 4, marging = 2, defaultColor = color('white'), titleColor = color('white'), space = 2, maxChar = 17, secondBlock = 115, showPriceLoot = true, showPriceSupplie = true, showAllLoot = false, showAllSupplie = false, showMed = true, showStatus = true, bkGcolor = color(60,60,60,60) } supplies = { suppliesname = {'strong mana potion', 'great mana potion', 'soft boots', 'sudden death rune'}, defineprice = { {name = 'great mana potion', price = 120}, {name = 'strong mana potion', price = 80}, {name = 'sudden death rune', price = 108}, {name = 'soft boots', price = 10000} } } loots = { itemlist = {'Quara Tentacle', 'Small Ruby', 'Small Amethyst', 'Quara Eye', 'White Pearl', 'Black Pearl', 'Small Emerald', 'Wand of Cosmic Energy', 'Knight Armor', 'Blue Robe', 'Glacier Shoes', 'Quara Pincers', 'Warrior Helmet', 'Glacier Robe', 'Crown Armor', 'Giant Shrimp', 'Quara Bone', 'Small Diamond', 'Skull Helmet', 'Relic Sword', 'Fish Fin', 'Stealth Ring'}, defineprice = { {name = 'Quara Tentacle', price = 140}, {name = 'Small Amethyst', price = 250}, {name = 'Quara Eye', price = 350}, {name = 'White Pearl', price = 160}, {name = 'Black Pearl', price = 280}, {name = 'Small Emerald', price = 250}, {name = 'Wand of Cosmic Energy', price = 2000}, {name = 'Knight Armor', price = 5000}, {name = 'Blue Robe', price = 10000}, {name = 'Glacier Robe', price = 11000}, {name = 'Glacier Shoes', price = 2500}, {name = 'Quara Pincers', price = 410}, {name = 'Warrior Helmet', price = 5000}, {name = 'Crown Armor', price = 12000}, {name = 'Giant Shrimp', price = 200000}, {name = 'Quara Bone', price = 500}, {name = 'Small Diamond', price = 250}, {name = 'Skull Helmet', price = 40000}, {name = 'Relic Sword', price = 25000}, {name = 'Small Ruby', price = 250}, {name = 'Fish Fin', price = 4000} } } generalStatus.fontSpacing = generalStatus.fontSize+generalStatus.fontSpace function additemcounter(name, amount) local amount = amount or 1 local index = table.find(suppliescount, name, 'name') if index then suppliescount[index].count = suppliescount[index].count+amount else printerror('Unable to find ' .. name .. ', please add it on supplies list!') end end init end

eSuppliesCounter.hScript: --CODED BY PEDROSHOW auto(100) dontlist() suppliescount = suppliescount or {} if #supplies.suppliesname ~= #suppliescount then suppliescount = {} for a, b in pairs(supplies.suppliesname) do local itemprice = itemprice(b) for y=1, #supplies.defineprice do if b == supplies.defineprice[y].name then itemprice = supplies.defineprice[y].price end end table.insert(suppliescount, {name = b:lower(), totalcount = servercount(b), count = 0, price = itemprice}) end table.newsort(suppliescount, 'name', 'asc') end for f, m in pairs(suppliescount) do if servercount(m.name) ~= m.totalcount then m.count,m.totalcount = m.count+1,servercount(m.name) end end

eLootCounter.hScript: --CODED BY PEDROSHOW auto(200) dontlist() lootcheck = lootcheck or {} if #loots.itemlist ~= #lootcheck then lootcheck = {} for c, d in pairs(loots.itemlist) do local itemprice = itemvalue(d) for y=1, #loots.defineprice do if loots.defineprice[y].name == d then itemprice = loots.defineprice[y].price end end table.insert(lootcheck, {name = d:lower(), count = 0, price = itemprice}) end table.newsort(lootcheck, 'name', 'asc') end foreach newmessage m do if m.type == MSG_INFO and m.content:sub(1,8) == 'Loot of ' then local content = (m.content:match('Loot of .-: (.+)')):token(nil,', ') for i,j in ipairs(content) do for x=1, #lootcheck do if j:find(lootcheck[x].name) then local amount = tonumber(j:match('(%d-) .-')) or 1 lootcheck[x].count = lootcheck[x].count + amount end end end end end

eSoft-Boots-Changer.hScript: init start local softequip,softunequip local softid = 6529 local softuseid = 3549 local wornsoftid = 6530 local bootsid = 'boots of haste' local alertifnosoft = false local soundfile = 'monster.wav' if type(bootsid) == 'string' then bootsid = itemid(bootsid) end init end if softequip == nil then softequip = math.random(70,75) --Mana percent range to equip soft boots end if softunequip == nil then softunequip = math.random(97,99) --Mana percent range to equip boots of haste back end auto(100) listas('dontlist') if ($mppc <= softequip or ($feet.id == wornsoftid and itemcount(softid) > 0)) and not $pzone and $feet.id ~= softuseid then equipitem(softid,'feet','backpack') softequip = nil wait(500,1000) elseif ($mppc >= softunequip or ($feet.id == wornsoftid and itemcount(softid) == 0) or $pzone) and $feet.id ~= bootsid then equipitem(bootsid,'feet','backpack') softunequip = nil wait(500,1000) end if $feet.id ~= softuseid and itemcount(softid) == 0 and itemcount(wornsoftid) > 0 and alertifnosoft then playsound(soundfile) end

eLife-Ring-Changer.hScript: init start local ringequip,ringunequip local ringid = 3052 local ringuseid = 3089 init end if ringequip == nil then ringequip = math.random(70,75) end if ringunequip == nil then ringunequip = math.random(97,98) end auto(100) listas('dontlist') if ($mppc <= ringequip) and not $pzone and $finger.id ~= ringuseid then equipitem(ringid,'finger','backpack') ringequip = nil wait(500,1000) elseif (($mppc >= ringunequip) or $pzone) and $finger.id == ringuseid then moveitems(ringuseid,'backpack','finger') ringunequip = nil wait(500,1000) end

eDrop-Vials.hScript: auto(15000,20000) listas('dontlist') if itemcount(284)+itemcount(283)+itemcount(285) > 50 then moveitems(284,'ground') moveitems(283,'ground') moveitems(285,'ground') end

eStandtime-Alert.hScript: auto(100) listas('dontlist') if $standtime > 240000 then playsound("monster.wav") listas('Standtime alert') end

eSD-Alert.hScript: auto (1000) listas('dontlist') if itemcount('sudden death rune') <= 10 then listas ('SD alert') playsound ('defaultmessage.wav') end

eMf-Alert.hScript: auto (1000) listas('dontlist') if itemcount('great mana potions')+itemcount('strong mana potion')+itemcount('mana potion') < 20 then playsound ('defaultmessage.wav') listas ('Mana alert') end

eSs-Death.hScript: init start local takess = true init end auto(10) listas('Take screenshot on death') if $hppc == 0 then if takess then screenshot() end takess = false else takess = true end

eStamina-Alert.hScript: auto(200) if $stamina < 60*43 then playsound("monster.wav") listas('Stamina Alert') flashclient() end

eAuto-Mount.hScript: auto(100) if not $pzone and $self.mount == 0 then mount() wait(1300,2400) end

eAnti-KS.hScript: init start local r = 4 -- Range. local safelist = {'Bubble', 'Eternal Oblivion'} -- The bot WILL KS this players. Add more to this if you want. table.insert(safelist, $name) -- Do not edit it. init end auto(100) local ppos = {} foreach creature p 'pf' do if not table.find(safelist, p.name) then table.insert(ppos, {x = p.posx, y = p.posy}) end end foreach creature c 'mf' do local ignore = false if c.id ~= $mattacker.id then for i = 1, #ppos do local difx, dify = ppos[i].x - c.posx, ppos[i].y - c.posy if math.abs(difx) <= r and math.abs(dify) <= r then ignore = true if c.ignored == false then ignorecreature(c.id) end break end end end if ignore == false and c.ignored == true then ignorecreature(c.id, true) end end if $attacked.id ~= 0 then if $attacked.ignored then stopattack() end end

eAuto-Haste.hScript: auto(1000) if maround(7) == 0 and not $hasted and not $pzone then cast('utani hur') waitping() end

eCap-Gold.hScript: init start local capmin = 500 local golddestination = GoldBpId setpriority(tonumber(getsetting('Cavebot/Looting/LootBodyPriority/Priority'))+1,0,500,5000,0) init end auto(100) if $cap > capmin and itemcount(3031,'dead') > 0 then moveitems(3031,golddestination,'dead') end

eGeneralInfo.hScript: local fontsize = 10 local fontspacing = fontsize+2 setposition($clientwin.x+260, $clientwin.y+10) setfontstyle("Tahoma", fontsize, 0xE4B31B) setfontweight(75) --addtext("Ping: " .. $pingaverage, 0, 0) addtext("Xp\\h: " .. num($exphour), 80, 0) --addtext("Next: " .. num(exptolevel()), 190, 0) --addtext("Time: " .. time(timetolevel()), 300, 0)

eSpellTimers.hScript: local row = 0 local fontsize = 10 local fontspacing = fontsize+2 setposition($clientwin.x+10, $clientwin.y+10) setfontstyle("Tahoma", fontsize, 0) setfontweight(75) if $hastetime > 0 then setfontcolor(0x64FF64) addtext("Haste: " .. timeshort($hastetime), 0, 0) row = 1 end if $mshieldtime > 0 then setfontcolor(0x6464FF) addtext("MShield: " .. timeshort($mshieldtime), 0, row*fontspacing) row = row + 1 end if $invistime > 0 then setfontcolor(0xFF64FF) addtext("Invis: " .. timeshort($invistime), 0, row*fontspacing) row = row + 1 end if $strenghtentime > 0 then setfontcolor(0xFF4646) addtext("Strenght: " .. timeshort($strenghtentime), 0, row*fontspacing) row = row + 1 end

eActiveHotkeys.hScript: local fontsize = 10 local fontspacing = fontsize+3 setfontstyle("Tahoma", fontsize, 0xE4B31B) setfontweight(75) local row = 0 local i = 0 while isscript("hotkey", i) do local listname = scriptlistname("hotkey", i) if listname ~= "" then setfontcolor(scriptlistcolor("hotkey", i)) addtext(listname, 0, row*fontspacing) row = row + 1 end i=i+1 end local i = 0 while isscript("persistent", i) do local listname = scriptlistname("persistent", i) if listname ~= "" then setfontcolor(scriptlistcolor("persistent", i)) addtext(listname, 0, row*fontspacing) row = row + 1 end i=i+1 end local i = 0 while isscript("cavebot", i) do local listname = scriptlistname("cavebot", i) if listname ~= "" then setfontcolor(scriptlistcolor("cavebot", i)) addtext(listname, 0, row*fontspacing) row = row + 1 end i=i+1 end setposition($clientwin.x+9, $worldwin.bottom-3-row*fontspacing)

eRecentLoot.hScript: init start local warnitems = {'fire sword', 'boots of haste', 'wand of inferno'} -- you can add more items here local maxindex = 5 -- max lines to display at once local fontsize = 10 local fontspacing = fontsize+3 local index = 0 local lootmsgs = {} local lootcolors = {} init end setfontstyle("Tahoma", fontsize, 0x00FF00) setfontweight(75) foreach newmessage m do if m.content:sub(0,8) == "Loot of " then local shortloot = m.content:sub(10) if math.random(0, 100) == 100 then shortloot = shortloot:gsub('a sword', 'a super sword') end lootmsgs[index] = shortloot lootcolors[index] = 0x00FF00 local i = 1 while warnitems[i] do if shortloot:find(warnitems[i]) then lootcolors[index] = 0xFF0000 break end i = i + 1 end index = index + 1 if index >= maxindex then index = 0 end end end local row = 0 local i = index local j = 0 while j < maxindex do if lootmsgs[i] then setfontcolor(lootcolors[i]) addtext(lootmsgs[i], 0, row*fontspacing) row = row + 1 end j=j+1 i=i+1 if i >= maxindex then i = 0 end end setjustify("right") setposition($worldwin.right-5, $worldwin.bottom-3-row*fontspacing)

eLoot-Counter-v2.0.hScript: init start if $windowsxp then generalStatus.bkGcolor = generalStatus.bkGcolor % 16777216 end init end --CODED BY PEDROSHOW shapeSize = shapeSize or 0 clist = generalStatus.space setfontweight(75) setfillstyle("color", generalStatus.bkGcolor) addshape("rect", 0, 0, 207, shapeSize + generalStatus.marging) setposition($clientwin.right-390, $worldwin.centery-270) setfontstyle(generalStatus.font, 10, generalStatus.titleColor) addtext('Items looted so far', generalStatus.marging, generalStatus.marging) setfontstyle(generalStatus.font, generalStatus.fontSize, generalStatus.defaultColor) for x=1, #lootcheck do local itemname = string.capitalizeall(lootcheck[x].name) if #itemname > generalStatus.maxChar then itemname = string.match(string.sub(itemname, 1, generalStatus.maxChar), '(.-)%s?$') .. '...' end if generalStatus.showPriceLoot then lootstring = num(lootcheck[x].count) .. ' (' .. math.floor((lootcheck[x].price*lootcheck[x].count)/100)/10 .. 'k)' else lootstring = num(lootcheck[x].count), generalStatus.secondBlock, clist*generalStatus.fontSpacing end if generalStatus.showAllLoot then addtext(itemname, generalStatus.marging, clist*generalStatus.fontSpacing) addtext(lootstring, generalStatus.secondBlock, clist*generalStatus.fontSpacing) clist = clist+1 elseif lootcheck[x].count > 0 then addtext(itemname, generalStatus.marging, clist*generalStatus.fontSpacing) addtext(lootstring, generalStatus.secondBlock, clist*generalStatus.fontSpacing) clist = clist+1 end end clist = clist+1 local loottotal = 0 for a, b in pairs(lootcheck) do loottotal = loottotal + (b.count * b.price) end addtext('Total: '.. num(loottotal).. ' GPs', generalStatus.marging, clist*generalStatus.fontSpacing) clist = clist+generalStatus.space setfontstyle(generalStatus.font, 10, generalStatus.titleColor) addtext('Supplies wasted so far', generalStatus.marging, clist*generalStatus.fontSpacing) setfontstyle(generalStatus.font, generalStatus.fontSize, generalStatus.defaultColor) clist = clist+generalStatus.space for x=1, #suppliescount do local itemname = string.capitalizeall(suppliescount[x].name) if #itemname > generalStatus.maxChar then itemname = string.match(string.sub(itemname, 1, generalStatus.maxChar), '(.-)%s?$') .. '...' end if generalStatus.showPriceSupplie then suppliestring = num(suppliescount[x].count) .. ' (' .. math.abs(math.floor((suppliescount[x].price*suppliescount[x].count)/100)/10) .. 'k)' else suppliestring = num(suppliescount[x].count) end if generalStatus.showAllSupplie then addtext(itemname, generalStatus.marging, clist*generalStatus.fontSpacing) addtext(suppliestring, generalStatus.secondBlock, clist*generalStatus.fontSpacing) clist = clist+1 elseif suppliescount[x].count > 0 then addtext(itemname, generalStatus.marging, clist*generalStatus.fontSpacing) addtext(suppliestring, generalStatus.secondBlock, clist*generalStatus.fontSpacing) clist = clist+1 end end clist = clist+1 local totalwasted = 0 for a, b in pairs(suppliescount) do totalwasted = totalwasted + math.max(b.count * b.price, 0) end addtext('Total: '.. num(totalwasted).. ' GPs', generalStatus.marging, clist*generalStatus.fontSpacing) clist = clist+generalStatus.space if generalStatus.showStatus then local profit = loottotal-totalwasted if profit > 0 then text = 'PROFIT' colorbased = color('green') else text = 'WASTE' colorbased = color('red') end setfontstyle(generalStatus.font, 10, colorbased) if generalStatus.showMed then local goldh = math.floor((profit*3600)/($exptime/1000)/100)/10 addtext(text .. ': ' .. num(profit) .. ' GPs (' .. math.abs(goldh) .. ' k/h)', generalStatus.marging, clist*generalStatus.fontSpacing) else addtext(text .. ': ' .. num(profit) .. ' GPs', generalStatus.marging, clist*generalStatus.fontSpacing) end clist = clist+1 end shapeSize = clist*generalStatus.fontSpacing

ePerfect-HUD-by-BlakW-v1.1.hScript: -- Pos & Style -- local fontSize = 8 local fontSpacing = fontSize + 4 setposition($clientwin.left + 4, $clientwin.top + 5) setfontstyle('Tahoma', fontSize, 0xC0C0C0) setfontweight(70) setjustify('left') local positionFromRight = 440 -- End -- -- Colors -- local white = 0xFFFFFFF local secondaryColor = 0xFFFFFFF local red = 0xFF3333 local green = 0x00CC00 -- End -- -- Don't change this! -- local a1 = 45 local a2 = 60 local a3 = 75 local a4 = 90 local a5 = 105 local a6 = 120 local a7 = 135 local a8 = 150 local a9 = 165 local a10 = 180 local a11 = 195 local a12 = 210 local a13 = 225 local a14 = 240 local a15 = 255 local a16 = 270 local a17 = 285 local a18 = 300 local a19 = 315 local a20 = 330 local a21 = 345 local a22 = 355 local a23 = 365 local a24 = 380 local a25 = 395 -- End -- -- Config -- local Level = true local Stamina = true local MagicLevel = true local SoulPoints = false local Position = false local PZ = true local ExpToLevel = true local ExpToday = true local xph = true local Club = false local Sword = false local Axe = false local sversion = true local Shielding = true local version = true local CaveBotEnabled = true local TargettingEnabled = true local LootingEnabled = true local HealthPotionsEnabled = false local HealthPotion = 'Health Potion' local ManaPotionsEnabled = false local ManaPotion = 'Mana Potion' -- End -- -- No change :) -- -- Level pos -- if Level == false then a2 = a2-15 a3 = a3-15 a4 = a4-15 a5 = a5-15 a6 = a6-15 a7 = a7-15 a8 = a8-15 a9 = a9-15 a10 = a10-15 a11 = a11-15 a12 = a12-15 a13 = a13-15 -- -- ExpToday Pos -- if ExpToday == false then a11 = a11-15 a12 = a12-15 a13 = a13-15 a14 = a14-15 a15 = a15-15 a16 = a16-15 a17 = a17-15 a18 = a18-15 a19 = a19-15 a20 = a20-15 a21 = a21-15 a22 = a22-15 a23 = a23-15 a24 = a24-15 a25 = a25-15 end -- End -- -- Fist Pos -- if Fist == false then a12 = a12-15 a13 = a13-15 a14 = a14-15 a15 = a15-15 a16 = a16-15 a17 = a17-15 a18 = a18-15 a19 = a19-15 a20 = a20-15 a21 = a21-15 a22 = a22-15 a23 = a23-15 a24 = a24-15 a25 = a25-15 end -- End -- -- Club Pos -- if Club == false then a13 = a13-15 a14 = a14-15 a15 = a15-15 a16 = a16-15 a17 = a17-15 a18 = a18-15 a19 = a19-15 a20 = a20-15 a21 = a21-15 a22 = a22-15 a23 = a23-15 a24 = a24-15 a25 = a25-15 end -- End -- -- Sword Pos -- if Sword == false then a14 = a14-15 a15 = a15-15 a16 = a16-15 a17 = a17-15 a18 = a18-15 a19 = a19-15 a20 = a20-15 a21 = a21-15 a22 = a22-15 a23 = a23-15 a24 = a24-15 a25 = a25-15 end -- End -- -- Axe Pos -- if Axe == false then a15 = a15-15 a16 = a16-15 a17 = a17-15 a18 = a18-15 a19 = a19-15 a20 = a20-15 a21 = a21-15 a22 = a22-15 a23 = a23-15 a24 = a24-15 a25 = a25-15 end -- End -- -- Distance Pos -- if Distance == false then a16 = a16-15 a17 = a17-15 a18 = a18-15 a19 = a19-15 a20 = a20-15 a21 = a21-15 a22 = a22-15 a23 = a23-15 a24 = a24-15 a25 = a25-15 end -- End -- -- Shielding Pos -- if Shielding == false then a17 = a17-15 a18 = a18-15 a19 = a19-15 a20 = a20-15 a21 = a21-15 a22 = a22-15 a23 = a23-15 a24 = a24-15 a25 = a25-15 end -- End -- -- Fishing Pos -- if Fishing == false then a18 = a18-15 a19 = a19-15 a20 = a20-15 a21 = a21-15 a22 = a22-15 a23 = a23-15 a24 = a24-15 a25 = a25-15 end -- End -- -- CaveBotEnabled Pos -- if CaveBotEnabled == false then a19 = a19-15 a20 = a20-15 a21 = a21-15 a22 = a22-15 a23 = a23-15 a24 = a24-15 a25 = a25-15 end -- End -- -- TargettingEnabled Pos -- if TargettingEnabled == false then a20 = a20-15 a21 = a21-15 a22 = a22-15 a23 = a23-15 a24 = a24-15 a25 = a25-15 end -- End -- -- HealthPotions Pos -- if HealthPotionsEnabled == false then a25 = a25-15 end -- End -- -- Start -- -- Training Status -- setfontcolor(0xFFCC00) addtext('-----------------------------------------', 0, 0) setfontcolor(white) addtext(' ~*~ Perfect HUD ~*~ ', 0, 10) setfontcolor(0x0099FF) addtext(' ~*~ By BlakW ~*~ ', 0, 20) setfontcolor(0xFFCC00) addtext('-----------------------------------------', 0, 30) -- Level -- setfontcolor(white) if Level == true then addtext(' Level:', 0, a1) addtext(num($level)..' ('..num(100 - levelpc())..'%)', 135, a1) end -- End -- -- Stamina -- if Stamina == true then addtext(' Stamina:', 0, a2) addtext(time($stamina), 135, a2) end -- End -- -- Magic level -- if MagicLevel == true then addtext(' Magic Level:', 0, a3) addtext(num($mlevel)..' ('..num(100 - $mlevelpc)..'%)', 135, a3) end -- End -- -- Soul points -- if SoulPoints == true then addtext(' Soul points:', 0, a4) addtext($soul, 135, a4) end -- End -- -- Position -- if Position == true then addtext(' X:', 0, a5) addtext($posx, 135, a5) addtext(' Y:', 0, a6) addtext($posy, 135, a6) addtext(' Z:', 0, a7) addtext($posz, 135, a7) end -- End -- -- Protection Zone -- if PZ == true then addtext(' Protection zone?', 0, a8) if $pzone == true then setfontcolor(green) addtext('Yes!', 135, a8) else setfontcolor(red) addtext('No!', 135, a8) end end -- End -- -- Exp to level -- if ExpToLevel == true then setfontcolor(white) addtext(' Experience Left:', 0, a9) addtext(num(exptolevel()), 135, a9) end -- End -- -- Experience Today -- if ExpToday == true then addtext(' Experience Today:', 0, a10) addtext(num($expgained), 135, a10) end -- End -- -- Exp/h -- if xph == true then addtext(' Experience Hour:', 0, a11) addtext(num($exphour), 135, a11) end -- End -- -- Club -- if Club == true then addtext(' Club:', 0, a12) addtext(num($club)..' ('..num(100 - $clubpc)..'%)', 135, a12) end -- End -- -- Sword -- if Sword == true then addtext(' Sword:', 0, a13) addtext(num($sword)..' ('..num(100 - $swordpc)..'%)', 135, a13) end -- End -- -- Axe -- if Axe == true then addtext(' Axe:', 0, a14) addtext(num($axe)..' ('..num(100 - $axepc)..'%)', 135, a14) end --End -- -- Script Version -- if sversion == true then addtext(' Script Version:', 0, a16) addtext(scriptversion, 135, a16) end --End -- -- Shielding -- if Shielding == true then addtext(' Shielding:', 0, a15) addtext(num($shielding)..' ('..num(100 - $shieldingpc)..'%)', 135, a15) end --End -- -- HuD Version -- if version == true then addtext(' HuD Version:', 0, a17) addtext('1.1', 135, a17) end --End -- -- CaveBotEnabled -- if CaveBotEnabled == true then addtext(' CaveBot Enabled?', 0, a18) if $cavebot then setfontcolor(green) addtext('Yes', 135, a18) else setfontcolor(red) addtext('No', 135, a18) end end --End -- -- TargettingEnabled -- if TargettingEnabled == true then setfontcolor(white) addtext(' Targeting Enabled?', 0, a19) if $targeting then setfontcolor(green) addtext('Yes', 135, a19) else setfontcolor(red) addtext('No', 135, a19) end end --End -- -- LootingEnabled -- if LootingEnabled == true then setfontcolor(white) addtext(' Looting Enabled?', 0, a20) if $looting then setfontcolor(green) addtext('Yes', 135, a20) else setfontcolor(red) addtext('No', 135, a20) end end --End -- -- HealthPotionEnabled -- if HealthPotionsEnabled == true then setfontcolor(0xFFCC00) addtext('-----------------------------------------', 0, a21) setfontcolor(white) addtext(' ~*~ Potions ~*~ ', 0, a22) setfontcolor(0xFFCC00) addtext('-----------------------------------------', 0, a23) setfontcolor(white) if HealthPotion == 'Health Potion' then addtext(' Health Potion/s:', 0, a24) addtext(itemcount(266), 135, a24) end if HealthPotion == 'SHP' then addtext(' S.Health Potion/s:', 0, a24) addtext(itemcount(236), 135, a24) end if HealthPotion == 'GHP' then addtext(' G.Health Potion/s:', 0, a24) addtext(itemcount(239), 135, a24) end if HealthPotion == 'UHP' then addtext(' U.Health Potion/s:', 0, a24) addtext(itemcount(7643), 135, a24) end end -- End -- -- ManaPotionsEnabled -- if ManaPotionsEnabled == true then setfontcolor(0xFFCC00) addtext('-----------------------------------------', 0, a21) setfontcolor(white) addtext(' ~*~ Potions ~*~ ', 0, a22) setfontcolor(0xFFCC00) addtext('-----------------------------------------', 0, a23) setfontcolor(white) if ManaPotion == 'Mana Potion' then addtext(' Mana Potion/s:', 0, a25) addtext(itemcount(268), 135, a25) end if ManaPotion == 'SMP' then addtext(' S.Health Potion/s:', 0, a25) addtext(itemcount(237), 135, a25) end if ManaPotion == 'GMP' then addtext(' G.Health Potion/s:', 0, a25) addtext(itemcount(238), 135, a25) end end

sKeyboard.cStuckCtrlShiftPolicy: If cavebot on, release after 3 secs

sMouse.cStuckCursorPolicy: If cavebot on, release after 3 secs
